metadata.title: CVE-2020-36244 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The daemon in GENIVI diagnostic log and trace (DLT), is vulnerable to aheap-based buffer overflow that could allow an attacker to remotely executearbitrary code on the DLT-Daemon (versions prior to 2.18.6).

criterions.comment: dlt-daemon package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
